item.title: The 'you' UX and UI
item.author: adas59@asu.edu (Amitabh Das)
item.description: There are 2 types of websites in the World Wide Web - The kinds which are easy and pleasant to use, and the other which makes you want to tear at your hair. And with the ease of creating websites these days, there are thousands of self-proclaimed web developers cropping up like weed every other day. In fact I’ve had the pleasure to work with some of them myself. A few days of crash course and they believe that they are “ready”.
